title: Add multi-platform shopping product index and search

requirements.summary: Create a Products page that displays indexed products from all shopping platforms in a responsive grid with product cards
acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a responsive grid
Each product card shows all required information
Platform source is visually indicated with a badge or label
Product links open in a new tab to the original platform

file_operations.description: Create Products component that fetches products using useActor hook and backend getAllProducts method, displays them in a responsive grid layout with product cards showing image, name, price, platform badge using generated logo images from frontend/public/assets/generated/, and external product URL links that open in new tabs

Create ProductCard component that renders individual product with image, name, price, category, platform badge (using generated logo images: frontend/public/assets/generated/amazon-logo.dim_64x64.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/flipkart-logo.dim_64x64.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/meesho-logo.dim_64x64.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/blinkit-logo.dim_64x64.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/generic-shop.dim_64x64.png), and external link button, using warm earth-tone styling consistent with existing design system

requirements.summary: Add search bar and platform filter to Products page for querying products by name or platform
acceptanceCriteria: Search input updates product display in real-time or on submit
Platform filter options include Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and All Platforms
Search integrates with backend search functionality

file_operations.description: Create ProductSearch component with search input field and platform filter dropdown (Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, All Platforms), using generated frontend/public/assets/generated/search-icon.dim_128x128.png for search icon, integrating with backend searchProducts method via useActor hook to filter displayed products
Integrate ProductSearch component into Products page, manage search and filter state, call backend searchProducts method with search term and platform filter to update displayed product grid

requirements.summary: Update navigation header to include Products link
acceptanceCriteria: Products link is added to Header component navigation
Link uses smooth scroll or routing to Products section/page
Active state is indicated when on Products page

file_operations.description: Add Products navigation link to Header component navigation menu alongside existing links, implement smooth scroll to Products section, add active state styling consistent with existing header navigation pattern
Add Products component to App layout after Hero section and before About section to integrate Products page into the single-page application flow

requirements.summary: Update Hero section to reflect multi-platform shopping index functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Headline communicates the multi-platform shopping index purpose
Text maintains the warm, professional tone of the existing design

file_operations.description: Update Hero headline to communicate multi-platform shopping product index purpose, update subheadline to mention Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and other shopping platforms, maintain warm professional tone consistent with existing design
